me.bhop.bjdautilities.command

Class LoadedCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.bhop.bjdautilities.command.LoadedCommand

  • public class LoadedCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a registered / loaded Command.

      • create

        public static LoadedCommand create(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Object> customParams)
        Generate a new LoadedCommand given its type and a set of custom parameters. This will only function if the class has a public no args constructor.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the command class
        customParams - the custom parameters to use with the command
        Returns:
        the new LoadedCommand

      • execute

        public CommandResult execute(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Member member,
                             net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.TextChannel channel,
                             net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message message,
                             java.lang.String label,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
        Execute this command.
        Parameters:
        member - the command sender
        channel - the channel which it was run
        message - the raw message used to initiate this command
        label - the current command label
        args - the arguments supplied to the command
        Returns:
        the result of the command

      • usage

        public boolean usage(net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Member member,
                     net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.TextChannel channel,
                     net.dv8tion.jda.core.entities.Message message,
                     java.lang.String label,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
        Execute a usage override on this command, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        member - the command sender
        channel - the channel which it was run
        message - the raw message used to initiate this command
        label - the current command label
        args - the arguments supplied to the command
        Returns:
        true if the command has a usage override and it has been invoked, false otherwise

        public java.lang.String getUsageString()

        Returns:
        the command usage

        Returns:
        the command description

      • getPermission

        public java.util.List<net.dv8tion.jda.core.Permission> getPermission()
        Get the permission nodes required to execute this command. Permissions are considered with AND logic, meaning the user requires all of the supplied permissions to execute the command
        Returns:
        the required permissions

      • getMinArgs

        public int getMinArgs()
        Get the minimum number of arguments required to execute this command successfully.
        Returns:
        the minimum arguments required

      • isHiddenFromHelp

        public boolean isHiddenFromHelp()
        Gets whether this command is hidden from help. This applies to the generated help, however it can be used for creating a custom help menu.
        Returns:
        whether this command is hidden from help

      • addCustomParam

        public void addCustomParam(java.lang.Object param)
        Add a custom parameter to this command only. This will not affect any other commands or any of this command's children.
        Parameters:
        param - the parameter to add
